description:
Sporet gir deg de fleste skiløyper i Norge med live oppdatering av preppestatus. Du ser løypemaskinene bevege seg i kartet og du får informasjon om skiføret fra dem som preparerer. I tillegg finnes beskrivelser av løyper, turer og skiområder/skidestinasjoner, og du ser parkeringsplasser, webkameraer og værmelding. Du får en egen turplanlegger og kan legge inn favorittløyper og favoritturer. Alt dette med sylskarpe, vektoriserte bakgrunnskart.

Sporet er utviklet av Skiforeningen i samarbeid med Swix og Geodata.

app_name: The Food App – Scan and swap
description:
This is the app for anyone who wants to make more informed choices about the food they eat. The app makes it easy for you if you want to avoid ultra-processed foods or have a food intolerance or allergy. Or if you simply want to know more about what your food contains.

You can do all of this for free and without limits in the app:
- Scan a product and see detailed information about its contents.
- Find out whether the product is ultra-processed or contains allergens you want to avoid.
- Read about all the additives the product contains.
- View detailed ingredient information from the Norwegian Food Composition Table.
- Create a shopping list.
- See the product’s Nutri-Score rating.

With a Plus subscription you can also:
- Search for products and additives.
- Browse categories and discover more products.
- Get swaps tailored to your preferences.
- Set additional preferences for things you want to avoid, such as ingredients and additives.

Terms of use and privacy:
https://www.thefood.app/terms

The Garmin Connect™ app is your one-stop source for health and fitness data. Whether you’re training for a race, keeping active or just staying on top of your health, Garmin Connect provides the information and inspiration you need to reach your goals. 
 
Once you pair your phone(1)with a Forerunner®, Venu®, fēnix® or another compatible Garmin device(2), you can review your tracked activities and health metrics. Plus, you can create workouts, build courses and challenge your friends on the leaderboard. 
 
With Garmin Connect you can: 
 
- Personalize your home screen, so the most helpful information is instantly visible 
- Analyze your activities with detailed statistics(3)
- Create customized workouts and courses 
- Review trends in health metrics like heart rate and steps 
- Earn badges for accomplishments 
- Sync with other apps like Apple Health, MyFitnessPal and Strava 
- Get support for Garmin devices and their features 
 
Learn more about Garmin devices and how they work with the Garmin Connect app at Garmin.com. 
 
(1) See compatibility requirements at Garmin.com/BLE 
(2) See a full list of compatible devices at Garmin.com/devices
(3) See Garmin.com/ataccuracy  
 
Note: Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

We want to inspire you to be healthy and happy.

To make sure you get the most out of your SATS membership, we aim to deliver better training experiences through this app.

GET INSPIRED

Discover new classes, check out PTs or go straight to one of your most booked sessions. Want an extra push? Try joining one or several challenges. Maybe you are like us and feel inspired when you train with friends? Add friends trough sharing QR-codes, see their group classes or invite them to yours. Like and comment their training to motivate each other*.

*The social experience is optional and can be turned off completely.

SEARCH, FIND & BOOK WORKOUTS\nFind and book the perfect group class or book a PT that can help you on your way to reach your goals, all added to your personal calendar if you want to. If you book a class and something changes, we will notify you from the app.

THE KEY TO THE GYM

Use the app as a partner to the clubs, log in with your personal QR code, which can also be found on your wearable.

KEEP TRACK

Activities that are performed at our clubs are automatically added; check-ins, group classes and PT sessions.

While your activities outside are also easy to add manually in the app.

SEE AND USE YOUR REWARDS

In SATS you earn extra benifits and discounts for working out or being loyal! All these can be found and used from the app.

---------------------------------

We will continue to upgrade this app frequently, so stay tuned for updates! 

Do you have feedback about the app? Then tell us what you think. You can do this directly in the app.

Live in sync with your cycle using Flo, the world’s most popular female health app. Get personalised insights and predictions on your body.

Whether you want to predict your period, get pregnant, track your pregnancy, or better understand your symptoms, Flo is your all-in-one female health partner. Join over 420 million members.

With Flo, you can:
- Keep your data safe: Flo is the first period and ovulation tracker to achieve dual ISO 27001 and ISO 27701 Certifications (aka gold standards in data protection).
- Feel more understood: Share your Flo insights via Flo for Partners to feel more connected, understood, and supported.
- Get an extra layer of protection: Anonymous Mode means no one, not even Flo, can identify you based on your health data.
- Join a supportive community: Secret Chats is where members can discuss topics and connect with others on the same journey.
- Access reliable health information: Flo collaborates with a globally recognised organisation dedicated to reproductive health and rights, ensuring trustworthy support for your health journey.

With Flo Premium, you can enjoy:
- Monthly cycle reports
- Symptom predictions and patterns
- Tailored prediction insights
- Detailed pregnancy tracking
- Full access to Flo for Partners
- A 24/7 virtual Health Assistant
- All articles, videos, and courses reviewed by 140+ health experts

New! Flo supports perimenopause:
- Know what might be perimenopause and how to tune in to your body’s changes.
- Get clarity on common perimenopause symptoms and what can help.
- Make more informed health decisions and identify what you need to feel your best.

Start tracking your cycle for free today.

Privacy Policy and Terms of Use:
https://flo.health/privacy-policy  
https://flo.health/terms-of-use 

Connect with Flo:
Web: flo.health
TikTok: @flotracker
Instagram: @flotracker

Please note: Flo is not a diagnostic tool and should not be used as a method of contraception or to facilitate conception. Predictions and insights provided by the app are intended for informational purposes only and are not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult a qualified healthcare provider for any health concerns or decisions.

Flo uses HealthKit to read menstrual cycle data and export your Flo activities to the Health app.

If you have any difficulties using the app, contact Flo via support@flo.health.

Notice of Access Permission:
Flo may request permission for:
- In-app notifications or reminders.
- Uploading photos to specific forum discussions.
- Uploading audio recordings to closed group chats.
Content sharing is entirely optional. Flo does not automatically access your content. You can select what you want to share.

Strava makes fitness tracking social. We house your entire active journey in one spot – and you get to share it with friends. Here’s how:

• Record everything – runs, rides, hikes, yoga and over 30 other sport types. Think of Strava as the home of your movement.

• Discover anywhere – our Routes tool uses de-identified Strava data to intelligently recommend popular routes based on your preferences. You can also build your own.

• Build a support network – Strava’s about celebrating movement. Here you’ll find your community and cheer each other on.

• Train smarter – get data insights to understand your progress and see how you improve. Your Training Log is the record of all your workouts.

• Get more from your workout – Powered by AI, Athlete Intelligence turns workout data into into instant insights. Keeping you motivated and ready for the next workout – without the guesswork.

• Move safer – share your real-time location with loved ones while outdoors for an extra layer of safety.

• Sync your favourite apps and devices – Strava is compatible with thousands of them (Apple Watch, Fitbit, Garmin – you name it).

• Join and create challenges – join millions in monthly challenges to chase new goals, collect digital badges and stay accountable.

• Embrace the unfiltered – your feed on Strava is filled with real efforts from real people. That’s how we motivate each other.

• Whether you’re a world-class athlete or a total beginner, you belong here. Just record and go.

Strava includes both a free version and a subscription version with premium features.
Strava uses HealthKit to export your Strava activities into the Health app and to read heart rate and biometric data.

You can subscribe and pay on the App Store, using your Apple ID. Payment will be charged to your Apple ID at confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renew may be turned off after purchase by going to the ‘Manage Subscription’ page in settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. The subscription will renew at the same cost.

Terms of Service: https://www.strava.com/legal/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.strava.com/legal/privacy

Hevy is the most intuitive workout tracker & planner in the world. No ads and free. Plan your weight lifting routines, log your workouts and track your exercise progress. Join a growing community and get started today - for free!

WHAT USERS ARE SAYING
•  "Seriously the best workout tracker I've ever used. Simple. Free. Tons of graphs. Amazing quality videos" - Sam Ilelaboye
•  "Seeing what my friends and other athletes are working out at the gym has totally changed my experience. Now I can copy my friend's workouts and compare myself. It's super motivating" - Jaume
•  "Tracking my workouts with Hevy has taken my training to the next level, I'm getting stronger every week. Being able to plan my routines really helps me being efficient at the gym." - Carlos D.

FEATURES
•  Track your lifts with an intuitive, simple to use interface.
•  Use the calendar to stay on top of your training schedule

•  Follow your friend's progress by following their lifts and copying their routines

Built on science, Sleep Cycle uses sound analysis to track and improve sleep for over 3 million users worldwide. Our sleep tracker and Smart Alarm clock app help you to identify potential sleep issues, gain valuable insights into your sleep patterns and build a healthier sleep routine.

Sleep Cycle is the world’s no.1 sleep app with more than 40 million downloads. Track your rest, wake refreshed, and build lifelong sleep habits.

AWARDS & RECOGNITIONS
Sleep Cycle has been awarded Best Sleep App in 2024 by Digital Health Magazine and featured as App of the Month in Wellness Today. In 2024, Sleep Cycle won two Merit Healthcare Awards: Gold for Mobile Digital Health Resources and Silver for Best Use of Artificial Intelligence.

WITH SLEEP CYCLE YOU CAN
• Wake up gently during your lightest sleep phase with our Smart Alarm clock.
• Track every night using patented sound technology or accelerometer-based sleep detection, no wearables needed.
• Detect nighttime noises like snoring, coughing, or sleep talking, for a path to quieter sleep.
• Drift off easily using our sleep sounds library of relaxing stories, sleepy soundscapes and guided meditations.
• Understand your sleep patterns with long-term trends and compare your sleep to global benchmarks.
• Log sleep notes to understand how caffeine, stress, or exercise affect your rest.

WHY USE SLEEP CYCLE?
• Wake feeling refreshed with no more groggy mornings.
• Get daily stats to help you understand your rest.
• Health insights with snoring and cough tracking for wellness.
• No gadgets, just place your phone on the nightstand.
• Premium tools like supportive soundscapes, sleep stories, data export, Philips HUE sunrise and Apple Health sync.

ABOUT SLEEP CYCLE
Sleep Cycle helps you sleep smarter. Track your nights, gain valuable insights into your sleep patterns, and wake at just the right time to start the day energized. Sleep Cycle gives you science-backed tools to help you improve your sleep for brighter days.

Our popular features include:
• Superior sleep tracker.
• Smart Alarm clock.
• Sleep talking recorder.
• Advanced sleep analysis.
• Snore tracker.
• Sleep timer. 
• Cough recorder.
• Sleep stages.
• Sleep programs.
• SleepGPT.
• Sleep goal and score.
• Relaxing sleep sounds like nature, rain and ocean sounds.
• Sleep Aid including calming meditations and breathing exercises.
• And more features to help you improve your rest.

TALK TO US
If you need any help please contact our customer service at support.sleepcycle.com

Har du tenkt å slutte med røyk eller snus? Slutta-appen hjelper deg på veien til et tobakksfritt liv.

OBS! Dette er den nye appen, den gamle appen heter nå “Slutta Classic” og vil ikke bli oppdatert fremover. Har du brukt den gamle appen? Notér ned sluttedatoen din. I onboardingen vil dagens dato automatisk være lagt inn, for å endre til din sluttedato trenger du bare å klikke på datofeltet for å få opp kalendervalg. Du kan også endre sluttedato under profil, ved å klikke på datoen som ligger inne får du opp kalendervalg der og.

Med Slutta-appen får du:
- daglige motivasjonsmeldinger som kan hjelpe deg
- råd og tips til hvordan du kan klare det
- oversikt over hvor mye du sparer på å være tobakksfri
- en teller som viser hvor lenge du klarer å være tobakksfri
- oversikt over giftstoffer i røyk og snus
- helsegevinster
- mulighet for å planlegge slutteprosessen i forkant

Velkommen til MOVA

For å få mest mulig ut av medlemskapet, anbefaler vi alle medlemmer å laste ned appen vår.

I appen finner du informasjon, nyheter og inspirasjon til en sunn og aktiv livsstil.

NØKKEL TIL TRENINGSSENTERET
Lås opp døren med appen og registrer din ankomst på senteret.

GRUPPETIMER
I appen kan du se vårt gruppetreningstilbud, booke time og avbooke time. Timene kan legges rett inn i din kalender.

PERSONLIG TRENING
Du kan booke time med PT og kjøpe PT-klipp i appen. Du får også en oversikt over antall klipp du har tilgjengelig til enhver tid.

MIN SIDE
Her kan du administrere ditt medlemskap, se bookinger, treningsstatistikk, verdikort etc.

KJØPE MEDLEMSKAP
I appen kan du også kjøpe medlemskap.

DROP-IN
Hvis du ikke er medlem, men ønsker en treningsøkt, kan du kjøpe drop-in time direkte i appen.

Meet your new self-care best friend! Finch is a self-care pet app that helps you feel prepared and positive, one day at a time. Take care of your pet by taking care of yourself! Choose from a wide variety of self-care exercises personalized for you.

THE BEST DAILY SELF-CARE APP

Struggling with stress, mental health, or need motivation? Is self-care a chore? Finch makes self-care finally feel rewarding, lightweight, and fun. Complete quick self-care exercises to grow your pet, earn rewards, and improve mental health! People who struggle with mental health, goals, meditation, and journaling found it easier to be mindful with their self-care pet in the Finch app!

REVIEWS

- "I’ve tried other apps for being thankful and thinking positive but never used them long. I enjoy this one because the virtual pet is really cute and it takes just a moment to be honest about I really feel."
- "As someone who struggles with anxiety and depression, I have tried many journaling apps and mood trackers. All of them felt like a chore, but not Finch! Even if I am not feeling like journaling or even facing my emotions, I can do so in order to help Finch."

QUICK CHECK INS

- Start mornings with quick mood checks and energize your pet to go exploring! Choose from a variety of quick mindful habits from goal tracking and bullet journaling to mindful breathing exercises and quizzes!
- End days in moments of gratitude with your self-care pet where they'll be back from adventures to share stories with you! Destress, reflect, and recognize your positive moments.

MINDFUL EXERCISES

Strengthen your mental health by increasing resilience, productivity, and gratitude with self-care exercises! Finch helps you hit goals and sustain healthy habits with your self-care pet!

- Goal Tracker: set goals and celebrate wins you've accumulated from healthy habits.
- Bullet Journaling: guided bullet journaling prompts to clear the mind, track important moments, and practice gratitude.
- Breathing: guided breathing to calm nerves, increase focus, energize your mind, and sleep better.
- Quizzes: quick quizzes to understand your mental health by tracking your anxiety, depression, body image appreciation, and more.
- Mood Tracker: check on yourself and access mood trends to understand what has been lifting you up or bringing you down.
- Quotes: read motivational quotes to lift your mood and gain new perspective.
- Sleep: Unwind yourself for good sleep with guided breathing and next day goal planning.
- Insights: get insights on your mental health from combined analytics on your mood tracker, bullet journal tags, goal tracker, and quizzes.

APPLE HEALTHKIT

Napper is the game-changing, award-winning app that uses data, science, and a little bit of algorithmic magic to predict your baby’s naps and bedtime - with almost uncanny accuracy.

Originally built by a dad on parental leave (still with us btw!) for him and his not-so-sleepy baby girl, Napper has now grown to help more than 100,000 families sleep better. So whatever issue you might be facing - short naps, frequent night-wakings, never-ending bedtime routines - there’s a good chance we can help you too.

→ Napper’s main features include…

• A personalized sleep schedule for your baby based on their natural sleep rhythms and research on infant sleep. The schedule adjusts as your baby's sleep needs change to promote healthy sleep habits and provide them with the restful sleep they need to grow and develop.

• User-friendly, straight-forward baby tracker to help you keep track of nursings, formula feedings, diaper changes and much more. You can also share your baby (and subscription) with as many caregivers as needed so everyone is on the same page.

• A large variety of sleep sounds, such as white noise, lullabies, and sounds of nature, that can be played in the background during naptime and bedtime. The sounds are carefully chosen to be gentle and calming, helping to create a peaceful and relaxing environment for your baby to sleep in.

• A comprehensive, science-based article series designed to help you establish healthy sleep habits for your baby. The course covers a wide range of topics, including the basic biological components of sleep, how to create a sleep-friendly environment and strategies for settling and soothing a fussy baby.

•  Trends & statistics presented in easy-to-read charts that give you useful insights, such as the average amount of time your baby spends asleep, the number of night wakings, and the duration of feedings. Easily spot and identify patterns and trends in your baby's sleep, which allows you to make adjustments to their sleep routine as needed.

—

All in all, we’d really like to think that Napper is the most complete baby sleep app out there. But don't just take our word for it though - here’s what other parents have to say about it:

"Great app, helped me work out when nap times should be and helped set a bedtime routine! Definitely recommend."

"This is one of the apps which every mom or another caregiver should download straight away. Thanks to Napper I could develop a deeper understanding of my 4-months old sleep patterns. And now he falls asleep fast and without cries. Thank you!"

"I love Napper! I've used 4 other sleep tracking apps (paid for) and Napper has to be my favorite! I love the aesthetic of the layout and how accurate it is."

"This app is amazing!! Very accurate for my son and has been for months. Great features to select number of naps and set bed time if trying to create a routine too."

"My baby is 11 months and I use it all day every day. Keeps us on schedule"

"This app is really great, it's like a baby manual that comes with your child! I really love it."

"Really useful, I'm sleep deprived and can't remember exactly what time everything happens! The predictive sleep feature is great. Developers very responsive to feedback"

"I LOVE Napper! I have used lots of baby trackers over my 4 kids and this one is hands down my favorite."

"The app is pretty great but the customer service is even better! I thought I was locked out of my account and they contacted me and got me back in within minutes! This app has revolutionized how we care for our newborn."

"This is the app that got us through the 4 months sleep regression! And I love that multiple caretakers can add track baby's sleep. Such a great help!"

So don't let sleepless nights and exhausted days be the norm - try Napper (yes, today!!) and give your baby the gift of restful, peaceful sleep!

—

Terms of use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
Privacy policy: https://napper.app/privacy

«Grubl» er en helt ny populærvitenskapelig helseapp laget for deg som ønsker å bruke mindre tid på grubling og bekymring. Å bruke «Grubl» er trygt og enkelt:

1. Du starter med en kort sjekk av helse & humør (den vil bli nyttig når opplegget er over).
2. Du ser en programserie om hvordan stressystemet settes i gang av grubling, og lærer hva oppmerksomheten har å si for hvordan vi har det.
3. Du får tilgang til ulike eksperimenter og små øvelser som gir deg bedre kontroll over grubling i 12 dager.
4. Du svarer en gang til på spørsmål om helse & humør. Har du fått det bedre?

A revolutionary way to track your meals, enhanced by AI.
Welcome to a new era of nutrition tracking, tailored to your style. With the new Lifesum experience, you can choose to log your meals by snaping a photo, using your voice, typing a text, or scanning a barcode. 
We made food tracking easy so you can make more healthy choices for your body and mind.

JOIN 65 MILLION USERS ON THE PATH TO BETTER HEALTH.
Health isn’t about perfection—it’s about progress. Lifesum encourages small, manageable changes that add up to lasting results. 
Whether it’s drinking more water, adding more fruits and veggies to your plate, or choosing healthier snacks, Lifesum celebrates every win, no matter how small.

SMARTER, SIMPLER MEAL TRACKING
Track your meals your way:
• Snap a photo to get instant nutrition details.
• Speak for easy, hands-free logging.
• Type for more detailed tracking.
• Scan barcodes for fast info.
• Use quick tracking for simple entries.

TOP LIFESUM FEATURES
• Calorie counter
• Macro tracker and food rating
• Nutrition plans for weight management and body composition
• Water tracker
• Fruit, vegetable, and fish tracker
• Meal plans with grocery lists included
• Integration with fitness trackers for in-depth health monitoring
• Life Score test for personalized nutrition recommendations

WEIGHT MANAGEMENT AND HEALTHY EATING
Whether you're looking to manage your weight, eat healthier, or simply feel better in your everyday life, Lifesum provides the tools and support to make your goals achievable, sustainable, and enjoyable.
From balanced meal plans to specialized lifestyles like keto, paleo, or high protein, Lifesum adapts to your preferences and needs. 
Simply share your goals, preferences, restrictions, and activity levels, and Lifesum creates nutrition plans just for you.
Lifesum also offers a massive library of delicious recipes, all crafted to help you eat smarter without compromising on flavor.

BEYOND CALORIES: A COMPLETE WELNESS SOLUTION
Lifesum goes beyond simple calorie counting. With its unique Life Score feature, the app evaluates your overall health based on your eating habits, hydration, and activity levels. 
This helps you focus on long-term well-being instead of short-term fixes. Additionally, you’ll find helpful tips and reminders to build healthy habits that last.

SEAMLESS INTEGRATION WITH YOUR LIFESTYLE
Lifesum works with your favorite apps and devices to give you a holistic view of your health. 
Sync with apps like Apple Health, Fitbit, Runkeeper, and Withings to track your steps, activity levels, and calorie burn effortlessly. 
Lifesum ensures your progress is always at your fingertips, making it easy to stay motivated and on track.

ALL YOU NEED FOR A CUSTOMIZED EXPERIENCE
• Calorie counter, with the option to adjust your daily calorie goal and add/exclude calories burned through exercise.
• Macro tracking and adjustable goals for carbs, protein, and fat intake. 
• Create and save your favorite foods, recipes, meals, and exercises.
• Body measurement tracking (weight, waist, body fat, chest, arm, BMI).
• A library of thousands of recipes with smart filters for quick results.
• A weekly Life Score based on nutrition and exercise measurements, so you understand where you are and what's next to build the healthiest version of you.
• Sync with health and fitness apps to track your steps and exercise in real time.

Lifesum is free to download and use with limited features. For the full Lifesum experience, we offer 1-month, 3-month, and annual Premium auto-renewing subscriptions.

Payment is charged to your credit card through your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless you turn off auto-renewal in iTunes account settings or cancel your subscription at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period.

View our Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy: http://api.lifesum.com/mobile-terms

Visste du at ifølge Aftenposten er mer enn 60 % av alle matvarer i norske butikker ultraprosessert?

Stadig flere nordmenn oppdager hvordan populære hverdagsprodukter inneholder unødvendige tilsetningsstoffer og kjemiske ingredienser, som kroppen ikke trenger, og som i flere tilfeller har fått påvist negativt helseeffekt. 

Utfordringen er at de kan være vanskelig å finne på pakningen og vanskelig å forstå. Dette gjelder spesielt for de med spesifikke matallergier eller intoleranser.

Vi har utviklet Frifor med kjærlighet til ren mat og et ønske om å gi folk mer kunnskap og forståelse for maten de spiser hver dag. Appen gjør dette på en enkel, effektiv og informativ måte.

For kun 39,- kr i måneden får du full kontroll over maten du spiser, med tilgang til:

— Matscanner: Scann strekkoden og se umiddelbart hva produktet inneholder, om det er ultraprosessert og om har unødvendige tilsetningsstoffer.

— Allergener: Frifor gir deg oversikt over alle de 14 vanligste allergifremkallende ingrediensene i mat, som for eksempel gluten, melk, nøtter og skalldyr.

— Personlige preferanser: Kontroller appens preferanser og la den sortere produktene etter det som er viktigst for deg, enten det er å unngå e-stoffer, karragenan, røykaroma, allergener, bovaer, eller om du bare ønsker fokus på ren mat.

— Norges største produktdatabase: Søk i en omfattende database med over 100 000 norske produkter fra alle de største dagligvarekjedene.

— Kunnskapsdatabase: Lær mer om hva ulike tilsetningsstoffer er og hvordan de kan påvirke kroppen din.

Frifor har blitt omtalt i alle de største norske mediene og blitt lastet ned av mer enn 500 000 nordmenn.


Bli en del av fellesskapet som tar informerte og bevisste matvalg for deg selv og familien.

Get the fitness, sports, and health results you want with the Technogym app and Technogym Coach.

Whether you train at the gym, at home, or on the go, enjoy access to an on-demand library of 1,000+ workouts, personalized workout programs, classes, the Wellness Magazine, individual and community challenges, and more to stay on track with your goals and boost your performance. 


GET A PERSONALIZED PRECISION PROGRAM 

The AI-powered Technogym Coach gives you guidance and encouragement, whether you want to start working out, get stronger, tone up, play your favorite sport better, improve your athletic performance, or simply live a longer and healthier life. 

Just tell Technogym Coach what your goals are, how much time you want to work out, and what equipment you have on hand, and you’ll get a personalized Precision Program you can adjust any time based on your location, equipment, needs, and progress.


ACCESS 1000+ ON-DEMAND WORKOUTS

A huge on-demand workout library – including HIIT, yoga, Pilates, strength training, mindfulness and stretching, and more – is just a swipe away with new workouts added each week.

Browse workouts for any goal, muscle group, and level, whether you want self-guided exercises, to work out on equipment with instructor-led classes, do bodyweight workouts at home, or train outdoors. 


CREATE YOUR OWN WORKOUTS 

Decide your own training journey with the workout builder feature, whether your focus is on weightlifting, cardio, or bodyweight exercises. Create, save, and edit your own workouts for specific days, training needs, and goals, and track your progress over time. 


GET WELLNESS TIPS & NEWS

Stay up to date on the latest news and tips in the world of training, lifestyle, nutrition, and mindfulness with the Wellness Magazine.


TEST YOURSELF WITH CHALLENGES

A bit of healthy competition is a great way to test your limits and stay motivated. Join our challenges across a wide range of activities and sports and collect badges to show off.


MONITOR YOUR PROGRESS

The Technogym app is compatible with major third-party tracking devices and apps and heart rate monitors as well as Apple Health and Apple Watch so you can track your activities, health numbers and stats, and know where you are in your training journey. 

You can also monitor your health information in your personal Wellness Passport area of the app; collect MOVEs (units that measure how active you are); and check your MOVERGY level (your two-week MOVEs average).

Bend® is the simple, affordable way to make stretching a part of your daily routine. Our quick & convenient stretching routines help you improve your flexibility and maintain your natural range of motion as you get older. We offer hundreds of stretches and yoga poses along with dozens of easy-to-follow stretching routines designed for all ages and experience levels. It's never too early to start stretching everyday!

STRETCHING IS IMPORTANT!

A simple, daily stretching routine can have a huge impact on your quality of life. Every time you stretch, you invest in your long-term health and longevity.

Stretching benefits include:
⊕ Increase flexibility & mobility in your muscles and joints
⊕ Prevent and relieve pain in your lower back, neck, hips, shoulders and more
⊕ Reduce the risk of injury during outdoor activities and sports
⊕ Improve sleep quality and energy throughout the day
⊕ Improve posture and strengthen your core
⊕ Reduce stress & anxiety
⊕ Improve athletic performance
⊕ Improve circulation and blood flow
⊕ Accelerate muscle recovery
⊕ Improve balance & coordination
⊕ And more!

BEND, DON'T BREAK!

Bend offers dozens of daily stretching & mobility routines for every occasion.

⊕ “Wake Up”
Designed to maintain your body’s natural mobility and range of motion. Simple, quick, convenient, and effective, you can do it anytime, anywhere, everyday.

⊕ “Posture Reset”
Specifically designed to improve your posture with seated stretches that can correct habitual posture problems by increasing flexibility in the shoulders, back, and neck.

⊕ “Full Body”
Focused on improving overall flexibility, with more than 20 stretching exercises and poses that target key muscles and joints throughout your entire body.

⊕ “Sleep”
Gentle, long-hold stretches designed to help you unwind and de-stress after a long day at work through better quality of sleep, which is made possible by relieving muscle tension and relaxing the body.

⊕ “Expert”
Advance group of stretching exercises and yoga poses that cover all major muscle groups and extremities. Flexibility and range of motion can be improved significantly with their more complex movements.

⊕ "Hips"
Open and unlock tight hips with deep, focused stretches designed to improve hip flexibility and undo hours of inactivity from sitting at a desk, in a car, or on the couch.

⊕ "Hamstrings"
Improve hamstring flexibility with subtle stretches designed to reduce hamstring tightness and relieve pressure on the knees, pelvis, and lower back.

⊕ "Lower Back"
Reduce and prevent lower back pain with gentle stretches designed to increase flexibility in the lower back, pelvis, and hip flexors.

⊕ "Isometric"
isometric exercise routines that build muscle, strength, balance, and range of motion in targeted areas through static muscle contraction.

⊕ And more!

CREATE YOUR OWN

Create your own custom stretching routine suited to your specific needs. Choose from hundreds of stretches, yoga poses, and isometric exercises in our library.

EASY-TO-USE

Bend makes stretching simple. We use custom illustrations and a timer to guide you through each routine. Every stretch has detailed instructions, information about its benefits, and specific things to be cautious about! 

STREAKS & ANALYTICS

Our dashboard displays your streaks and analytics to track your progress and you can set reminders to help motivate you to stretch every day. Check your Bendometer as a quick way to see how consistent you’ve been stretching over the last few weeks. We recommend trying to keep your Bendometer score above 90%!

APPLE HEALTH
Bend integrates with the Health app, giving users the option to sync their health information and activity with Apple Health.

FEEDBACK & SUPPORT
If you have any questions, feedback, or suggestions, feel free to contact us at hello@bend.com!

LEGAL

Privacy Policy: https://bend.com/privacy

Looking for a simple and reliable way to track your heart health and overall well-being? The PulseMate App helps you monitor your heart rate, track blood pressure trends, record blood sugar levels, log vital health data and get personalized healthy suggestions—all in one place, right from your iPhone.

Key features：
Heart rate measurement: Just place your finger lightly on the camera area of   your phone to measure your heart rate.

Blood sugar, blood pressure and temperature records: Conveniently record daily blood pressure, blood sugar and temperature data, PulseMate will generate detailed trend charts for you to help you track health changes.

AI Care: Talk to your dedicated AI health consultants anytime, anywhere. Personalized suggestions can help you make better daily health choices.

HRV analysis: Evaluate your overall health status by monitoring key indicators such as stress, energy and tension.

Drinking water record and reminder: Remind and record daily water intake to help you maintain adequate hydration.

Breathing exercise: Through scientific breathing exercises, it helps you relax, relieve stress and reduce anxiety.

Mental health test: Regularly evaluate mental health status to help you pay attention to your emotions and mental state in time.

Heart health risk test: Through a simple questionnaire, you can gain an in-depth understanding of your heart health status and provide personalized health suggestions.

Health data overview: Centrally view all daily health indicators, manage your health data in one stop, and easily grasp health trends.

How to measure heart rate：
Place your finger lightly on the iPhone's camera lens.
Maintain full coverage of the lens with your fingertip.
Hold steady throughout the duration of the measurement until completion.

Important reminder: 
This application is for personal monitoring and information reference only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice or treatment. If you feel any discomfort or other emergency, please seek medical assistance from a professional medical person immediately.

Subscription Conditions:
- Subscribe to get unlimited access to all premium features.
- Subscription length: weekly, yearly.
- The iTunes account will be charged after the trial period ends.
- You should be aware that the subscription will automatically renew unless you close the automatic renewal at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
- After purchase, you can turn off automatic renewal at the account settings.
